body.description: JSON payload for creating a sales return (refund)

body.raw:
{
  "id_penjualan": 123,
  "id_user": 1,
  "id_gudang": 1,
  "retur_type": "exchange",
  "tgl_retur": "2025-01-18",
  "keterangan": "Tukar barang dengan yang lain",
  "retur_items": [
    {
      "id_item": 1,
      "id_satuan": 1,
      "kode": "ITEM-001",
      "produk": "Kopi Hitam",
      "satuan": "PCS",
      "qty": 1,
      "harga": 50000,
      "subtotal": 50000
    }
  ],
  "exchange_items": [
    {
      "id_item": 2,
      "id_satuan": 1,
      "kode": "ITEM-002",
      "produk": "Kopi Susu",
      "satuan": "PCS",
      "qty": 1,
      "harga": 55000,
      "subtotal": 55000
    }
  ]
}
